items.sentence: I expected Tom to bring his girlfriend to the party.
I'll return your book on Monday if I've finished it.
I have no objection to asking Tom to do that for us.
I haven't heard from Tom since he went to Australia.
The prime minister fell into the Danube and drowned.
The girl went into the forest to look for mushrooms.
I think Tom and Mary are both trying to lose weight.
I'm still not certain that I'll be able to be there.
Tom would've done that already if he'd known how to.
Do you really think doing that would be interesting?
Do you really think doing that would be a good idea?
Tom couldn't read the menu because it was in French.
You didn't tell Tom what you wrote to Mary, did you?
The advice I got from Tom made me a better salesman.
The men who were here last night were Tom's friends.
Do you think that Tom could find Australia on a map?
Tom was the first person to encourage me to do this.
Tom is probably not the oldest person in the office.
Tom is one of the best singers that I've ever heard.
Tom doesn't play with his dog as much as he used to.
